example.description: Disables source/destination checking for the specified network interface. To re-enable checks, use a value of $true for the -SourceDestCheck parameter.
Applies the specified description to the network interface.
Changes the security group for the network interface to be the single group with the ID "sg-1a2b3c4d".
Changes the security groups for the network interface so that the groups with the specified IDs are used.
Modifies the network interface so that the specified attachment is deleted on termination.
